alert.note: Alert for Bellevue and Vicinity; Bremerton and Vicinity (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 12:23PM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kitsap... southwestern Snohomish and northwestern King Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1223 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Seattle, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seattle, Edmonds, Kirkland, Lynnwood, Bothell, Mountlake Terrace, Woodinville, Shoreline, Bainbridge Island, Kenmore, Lake Forest Park, Brier, Medina, Richmond Highlands, North Creek, Winslow, Sheridan Beach, Kingsgate and Maltby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; Bremerton and Vicinity
